member.name: EXP_PROPERTYSTORAGE
member.summary: Stores information about the Shell link state. This structure is used for extra data sections that are tagged with EXP_PROPERTYSTORAGE_SIG.

member.name: EXP_PROPERTYSTORAGE.cbSize
member.summary: The size of this structure, in bytes.

member.name: EXP_PROPERTYSTORAGE.dwSignature
member.summary: Identifies the type of block and is the value EXP_PROPERTYSTORAGE_SIG.

member.name: EXP_PROPERTYSTORAGE.abPropertyStorage
member.summary: A serialized property store in the format defined by SERIALIZEDPROPSTORAGE.
